name: Core Spawn Worm
languages: understands Deep Speech but can\'t speak

traits.Illumination: The worm sheds dim light in a 20-foot radius.
traits.Radiant Mirror: If the worm takes radiant damage, each creature within 20 feet of it takes that damage as well.
traits.Tunneler: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.
